H0.text: Electromagnets are what induction cooktops have under their surface.

H1.text: Chambers are what induction cooktops have under their surface.

H2.text: Clumps are found under the surface of induction cooktops.

H3.text: Screws are located under the surface of induction cooktops.

A4.text: All such elements share an electromagnet sealed beneath a heat-resisting glass-ceramic sheet.
